page.title: 04NEWTON REIGNY CHURCH PENRITH
page.content: Newton Reigny church celebrated 400 years with a flower festival which was an open-air event,with Morris Dancers and Penrith Town band.The service was well attended.The preacher was the Reverend Christopher Lewis.All the people that were baptised and married there in the past, were invited. Despite the weather,the event,one of a number to celebrate a major restoration of St.John church,was a great success.The weather here can be very hot in July, at times reaching up to 20-25 C. After the hot weather it rains but is still quite warm.There is very little pollution in this area except for crop spraying.There are a lot of good walks,and bicycle rides. The hedgerows are full of Wild Buttercups,Clover,Pink Campion, Foxgloves,Lady's Slipper and Kesh.
